WorkItem.ClosedComment: fixed once more in Changeset 36709.As workaround for 2.2.16 rename the set to Thrall's Regalia.
WorkItem.Description:
The T9 bonus should be fixed in the newest release - but it's not. Or is it, but then just not showing in the Buffs tab? Or did I miss something?
Â 
...I attached my xml - and if you look at the buffs tab, there isnt any check mark in the T9 2 piece bonus, even though I have the helm and chest equiped?

Comments.Message: I just put on 4T9 items - and it still doesnt show up - non of them, 2T9 or 4T9.
It works fine for me. Perhaps your Item Cache has wrong set names saved for those items.

Tested this myself using a blank character sheet and putting on all five pieces of tier gear (iLvl 245 version).  The check mark in the 2T9 or 4T9 doesn't show up.  I reloaded all of the items from wowhead, and nothing.  Going into the edit function, the set name for all the pieces is listed as "Nobundo's Regalia".
It was my item cache that needed a refresh. I found the error. And it exists because someone else changed the names of the sets from Thrall's to Nobundo's. I'll see to get this fixed.
